tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from kijiji.ca using our Scraper API. Get Information such as Search Results, Listing Information and URL Extraction.
name: Kijiji
title: Kijiji

api_list.name: Get Listing By URL
api_list.description: Get Listing Information from a URL.

api_list.name: Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need more custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results Page URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need more custom filters.

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results using Keyword and Filters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- dateAsc
- dateDesc
- priceAsc
- priceDesc
- matchDesc
